text: 10.15: Ais 14.13-15Nde kha Kaperneaman ki gumgi gu mbigi, nde khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi thi? Mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme nde suirav nde vun fegɨrim, nde za kha buiv shɨ guarara phorgirga thi? Fhuvara! Nde Fhe Bakɨme guigira nde mbevarim, nde za kha nuiana khɨna guarara ŋgirɨp, vhɨzgi gumgi ki ŋgun ŋgirgɨrga.”
